author: Brooke Singman
title: Bolton joins calls for WHO director’s resignation: ‘Accomplice to China’s massive coverup’
description: Former national security adviser John Bolton is joining mounting calls for the director of the World Health Organization to resign, calling him an “accomplice to China’s massive coverup” as the world grapples with the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
